 Nightlight:
"I know... that something could result wrong"replied Nightlight "But I wish help... I feel that I should do something else... but I'm not effective in combat... what other thing can I do?"
  Rudra656@... wrote: OOC: I had thought it was a ship that crashed into a mountain, and was thus mostly buried.  In any case it should be hard to penetrate. 

::Aerotaur:: 
      He looks worried.  "You know what happened to the last bot he reprogrammed.  And I like you just the way you are.  But if you're set on doing this I'll support you all the way."  He half grins.
